name: Detective Mrozinsky
description:
Miami, 1985. It's a warm summer night.

This short text adventure game is based on a polish copypasta. It was made for The Text-Based Adventure Game Jam.

Source material: https://www.wykop.pl/wpis/35183423/podjezdzam-pod-klub-wysiadam-poprawiam-marynarke-j/

Cover art by Ewix 2000.

The game may not display correctly in Chrome. Try Firefox or Edge if you have any problems. (We're working on that.)
